content: 解决Python3报错的问题-ImportError: urllib3 v2.0 only suports Openssl 1.1.1+
description: 解决Python3报错的问题-ImportError: urllib3 v2.0 only suports Openssl 1.1.1+
excerpt_html: 解决Python3报错的问题-ImportError: urllib3 v2.0 only suports Openssl 1.1.1+
excerpt_text: 解决Python3报错的问题-ImportError: urllib3 v2.0 only suports Openssl 1.1.1+
html: 解决Python3报错的问题-ImportError: urllib3 v2.0 only suports Openssl 1.1.1+
summary: 一、现象 环境：Python 3.7.2 现象：Python文件中引入了requests库，在执行的时候报错： ImportError: urllib3 v2.0 only suports Openssl 1.1.1+, currently the 'ssl' module is compiled with openssL 1.0.2k-fips 26 Jan 2017. See: https://github.Com/urllib3/urllib3/issues/2168 二
title: Python3 Requests依赖报错-ImportError: urllib3 v2.0 only suports Openssl 1.1.1+
